body.name: THE GYM PEOPLE Womens' Yoga Pants High Waist with Pocket Tummy Control

byLineInfo.name: Visit the THE GYM PEOPLE Store

features: Two Side Pocket: our women’s yoga pants with a design of a secure Two Side pocket that can hold simple objects such as iPhone 6 7 8 plus or credit cards and other necessaries.

Flat Seam Craft: our Yoga legging is specially designed to remove the line on each side, it features flat seam craft to reduce irritation and eliminate chafing, also allows for maximum comfort, and is Wear-resistant.
Yoga Leggings Design: Take the four needles six lines sewing technology, flat and smooth. Second-skin fit design, close-fitted but not too tight, soft, and super comfortable.
Elastic Waistband: women's workout pants are designed with high-waist, tummy control wide waistband contours your curves and streamlines your shape, also anti-drop and high-waist prevent muffins.
Suitable for: yoga pants are soft and stretchy perfect not just for Yoga, Workout, Hiking, fitness, and running, but also comfortable for any indoor/outdoor activities.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are the best gym leggings I have ever owned. I just bought two new pairs after having another pair for two years!!! Comfortable, form fitting, NOT see through, and breathable. I’m not a small girl, and I’m never worried when I wear these. Amazing product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing in every way possible
reviews.reviewText: These are probably one of the best pairs of leggings that I’ve ever owned. When I first opened the package, they looked like they would be too small and too short. I tried them on and they are a perfect fit. They are so soft, and it compresses everything without that uncomfortable/tight compression feeling. They also do not get loose or anything throughout the day from wear. Lastly, most importantly for me… Kim no camel toe!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Thin material but doesn’t feel flimsy. The waistband stays in place and fits well! I’m 5’6 175 lbs and I got the large! It’s a little loose but still super comfy and I prefer the extra room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite Amazon leggings!
reviews.reviewText: I've purchased maybe 10 pairs of exercise pants off Amazon now, all from different brands, and these are by FAR my favorite.The Waist: The waist comes up high enough to be a true high waist, without coming up so far that it folds. There's a thin elastic band at the top of the waist that honestly I didn't even notice the first time I wore them, and it seriously helps hold these pants up - they're the only pair I have (other than my Yogalicious leggings, purchased from TJMaxx, which also have that thin elastic waist) that I'm not constantly pulling up as I'm walking around.The Length: They're right at that perfect ankle length for me - I'm 5'7 and ordered a medium, and there's no bunching at all at the bottom of the leg.The Feel: Amazing. They're a typical "workout" material (as in, not the trendy "buttery" feel), so they slide on nicely, hug you just enough to be supportive without making you feel like a stuffed sausage, and are thick enough to hide any pesky cellulite.The Fit: I'm 5'7, ~160lbs, athletic build (hello hips and thighs) and ordered a size M. I'm usually somewhere between a 4-6 in jeans depending on the brand, and for leggings either a S/M depending on the brand, so I'm always nervous when I can't try things on in-store. Thankfully, the M is perfect for me - slightly compressive, no extra fabric bunching behind the knees or at the waist, and extremely comfortable to workout in. If you prefer your pants more compressive, I'd definitely size down.The Rest:-These pants have 2 pockets, and my iPhone X fits in them perfectly with the case on. I'm normally not a pockets-person for gym clothes, but these are wonderfully minimalistic - only two small stitching lines down each side, no extra "details" or fuss.-There is a front seam, for all you front-seam haters - but I've yet to find a pair of seamless pants that actually stays up.-The black leopard pattern is beautiful, more subtle than I anticipated (in a good way) - there's a shine to the pattern itself which makes it pop against the black base, rather than having two different colors.-These are 100% squat proof, don't show any sweat, and (so far) have not shown any signs of pilling at the crotch seams as tends to happen. I've been washing them inside out on cold and line drying them, for reference.The only thing that would make these pants more perfect would be if the back seam (the one that cuts across the top of your butt) had a slight V-shape to help enhance the booty - but don't let that stop you from buying these in every color!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect workout pants
reviews.reviewText: The reviews were accurate. I could not wait to wear my pants to the gym and to bootcamp to try these out to see if reviews were on point. Baby, these pants did not disappoint. They fit well, are comfortable and most importantly did not slide down the entire class. In bootcamp class, we did squats, burpees, jumping jacks, ab work, jump squats, etc. and the pants stayed in place. I love it and will be ordering more. Glad I found these pants. These are my favorite workout pants. A very happy customer and highly recommend. Don't hesitate to buy. These are it!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars High shallow pockets
reviews.reviewText: I really like these leggings except for the pockets. The pockets are shallow and they are higher on the hip than other leggings I’ve had.**But I think the reason the pocket feels too high is because it is so shallow. On my other leggings I think the pocket starts in that area but the phone goes down lower so it sits closer to the top of your thigh instead of right on your hip. The bulk of the phone squarely on my hip feels and looks weird. That’s why I returned them.I have an iPhone 12 pro, which is not the giant one, and you can see that it sticks out. (It may look in the photo like I don’t have the phone pushed down all the way but I have the case pushed down as far as it would go.)There’s really no excuse for the pockets to not be deeper.Other than that they are really nice leggings. I love the fit and the length is great for a tall person. I’m 5’9 /170 and large fits right.They just need to improve that pocket because I am unlikely to try other leggings by this brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I sized down
reviews.reviewText: These pants are great. I wear them multiple times a week working out and the waist band stays in place! 🙌 I’m currently in between sizing so I’m glad I sized down to a Med and the waist band still has some give.They are so soft to the touch as well. They are not too tight but just the right amount to keep everything comfortable while working out.A bonus is the pockets which are so nice to have on both sides and up higher towards the waistband versus down the middle of your thigh.I am definitely going to be snagging a few more.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute, comfortable, and practical
reviews.reviewText: These leggings fit perfectly! The waistband is perfect for holding everything together. It is super flattering and comfortable, a seamless fit! Totally recommend!
El material es muy ajustable y suave, no transparente y viene en su talla normal

When I opened my package I thought there is no way that these tights would fit…. I tried them on and was hoping and praying to get my arse in them 😅😅 they went on like silk and are the most comfortable and flattering thing I own, they are amazing 🤩. I’m a size 22 and got the xl. Buy these pants!!!!

reviews.reviewTitle: Tiene un resorte en la cintura
reviews.reviewText: La tela estira, no comprime y tiene un resorte en la cintura, no me gustó eso, se marca horrible el resorte, no lo volvería a comprar
